abstract: Hillary Clinton’s campaign has begun airing a new ad in Iowa that was not announced publicly, a spot that focuses on ending “the wage gap” and criticizes Republicans who will let “corporations write their own rules.”

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Ad in Iowa and New Hampshire Focuses on Wage Gap

snippet: Hillary Clinton’s campaign has begun airing a new ad in Iowa that was not announced publicly, a spot that focuses on ending “the wage gap” and criticizes Republicans who will let “corporations write their own rules.”
